CustomField.formula: IF( OR( TEXT(Type) = 'New Customer', TEXT(Type) = 'New Service', TEXT(Type) = 'Upsell' ), Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c, IF( Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c - Current_Contract_Value__c <= 0, 0, Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c - Current_Contract_Value__c ) )
CustomField.label: Annual Contractual Value Growth
